title: Previously logged-in/ auth flow not yet completed
custom_preconds:
WHEN a user is logged into the app with an MLB.com account
AND has not yet gone through the MVPD auth flow
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the Play button on the MLB Network Tab in the Watch View
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to MVPD auth flow

title: Not previously logged-in
custom_preconds: WHEN a user has not logged into the app with their MLB.com account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps Play button on MLN Network Tab in Watch view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is redirected to the MLBN login page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs in or creates an account from MLBN login page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is redirected take to MVPD auth flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user completes MVPD auth flow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MLB Network player is able to play

title: Previously logged in and completed auth flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged into the app with their MLB.com uername
AND they have previously completed the MVPD auth flow
custom_steps: WHEN they click the play button on the MLB Network tab on the Watch View
custom_expected: THEN the MLB Network stream will play

title: Messaging- auth flow
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user that has not completed MLB Network auth flow

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an error message is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user provides valid cable credentials without entitlements
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an error message is presented

title: Logged in and completed auth flow- relaunching app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user that has previously completed the MVPD auth flow
AND the user has closed the app and restarted it
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the play button in the MLB Network Tab on the Watch view
custom_expected: THEN the MLB Network stream should play (User does not need to re-auth after killing/re-launching app/browser)

title: A, B, C feeds
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in a particular zipcode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN that user's zipcode has not been slated for alternate feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see feed A (the regular MLB network feed)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user's zipcode has been slated for alternate feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see feed B (an alternate feed other than the regularly scheduled programming, marked as alternate feed)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user's zipcode has been slated forblackout
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see feed C (slate feed)

title: MLBN  un-entitled user
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with no MLBN entitlement

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLBN content is published by editorial (mark this step as blocked if content is not readily available or test via proxy)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content is NOT displayed in either the hero or the games carousel according to app logic

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes MLBN content in an VOD/SVOD carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the content is displayed with a lock icon
AND the content includes a "LIVE" tag

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user attempts to launch MLBN content from within a VOD/SVOD carousel

title: MLBN  entitled user
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with the MLBN entitlement

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLBN content is published by editorial (mark this step as blocked if content is not readily available or test via proxy)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content is displayed in either the hero or the games carousel according to app logic

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes MLBN content on the Watch Now page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content is labeled with a "LIVE" tag

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user attempts to launch MLBN content from the hero on the Watch Now Tab
(mark this step as blocked if content is not readily available or test via proxy)

WHEN the user attempts to launch MLBN content from the games carousel
(mark this step as blocked if content is not readily available or test via proxy)
WHEN the user attempts to launch MLBN content from within a VOD/SVOD carousel
